title: Colours Fade: Based On a True Story, A Young Refugee Travels from Afghanistan to the United Kingdom and Does the Unthinkable
description: ***Please write a review - I'd Love to know what you think***Based On a true story, a young refugee who travels 3,616 miles from Afghanistan to the United Kingdom and does the unthinkable. In the blink of an eye, he had lost everything; his mum, dad and the family that meant the world to him, and having to abandon the most beautiful girl he ever knew; his first love. With no other choice, he was off travelling through a number of countries, facing many adventures, becoming a man and searching for a better life is not easy!Falling in love, for the second time, with a foreign girl was out of question but everything happens for a reason. A new start, happiness, love and a perfect life when suddenly everything starts to unravel. Throwing him into situations that require him to dig deep inside of himself to decide what truly matters. What would you do to make everything right? How far would you go to save the one you love?Kill? Revenge? Start all over again? Walk away? Try to be a superhero and save the day, or turn into a villain?What I did wasâ€¦
author: Zabi Saffi
